span.div: Welcome to the Graham Local Schools! Our vision statement is “Success today, Prepared for tomorrow.” We are committed to reaching the goals of the Graham 2020 Strategic Plan through collaborative efforts of students, parents, staff, Board of Education members, and community members.

As your Superintendent for the 2019-20 school year, I am returning to a position I held in 2015-16. I am pleased and humbled to again be a part of this strong community as we build on the tradition of quality education that so many before us established and helped flourish. Please join me in celebrating “What’s Good at Graham” often.

There is much within the schools in which to be proud and I encourage you to make yourself part of the excitement! You have my personal commitment to the Graham Mission Statement: “Partnering with community, we offer a safe and nurturing environment to educate the whole child, focused on developing individuals and lifelong learners to better our world.”
